author: Simon Difford
description: Spirituous enough for a pirate. Why the name? Well, one of the rums has some 'funk', both rums have nautical connections, the lime protects against scurvy, the cinnamon schnapps liqueur has pieces of gold and grenadine is blood red. Well, seemed appropriate to me!
name: Funky Pirate Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
